p: Among these antiviral herbs, those specifically important to mention are the anti-coronavirus medicinal plants. Plant extracts can be useful against COVID-19 because it belongs to the Î² genus of coronavirus and is thus closely related to the previous coronaviruses against which these plants have shown potent activity. There is a whole list of herbs assessed for their activity against SARS-CoV viruses ( Table 2 ). Most notable among them are the Lycoris radiata (Li et al., 2005c) , Artemisia annua, Lindera aggregate, Isatis indigotica ( Lin et al., 2005) , Torreya nucifera ( Ryu et al., 2010 ), Houttuynia cordata ( Lau et al., 2008), Pelargonium sidoides ( Whitehead et al., 2019), and Glychirrhiza spp. ( Fiore et al., 2008).
